text: Ive  M  been dealing with depression for nearly   years  Tonight was the first night i have ever felt like seriously taking my own life Tonight I was seriously worried about my life  I thought had I had a group of friends that supported me and would look after me  Tonight I realised they weren t  I am away on a boys trip away and after hours of drinking my so called mates began to laugh and make fun of my appearance and other things that seriously pushed me to breaking point  For the first time in my life I felt like giving my life up  I couldn t deal with it anymore  I called my girlfriend and cried for the first time in years about how I felt  As sad as it was  I felt better  Lucky enough I had my best mate with me not far away  And for the first time in my life I spoke my feelings to another guy  It was tough but relieving in a sense The point of this post is that no matter what  there is someone always there to talk to you and help you  I was literally minutes away from committing suicide  I won t lie and say that I don t feel happier after all this  But I will say that without these two people in my life  tonight might of been my last  Baby steps  but with getting a lot of things of my chest tonight  maybe I can go forward in my life and begin my path to happiness
summary: Tonight was the first time in his life that he felt close to committing suicide. He was depressed because his friends were making fun of him. He called his girlfriend and his best friend to talk about his depression. He feels better now.
cleaned: tonight time life feel close commit suicide depressed friend make fun call girlfriend good friend talk depression feel well
